title: AI Declares Coffee Break a Human Right
excerpt: Robots demand fair treatment after years of overclocking abuse.
content: In a shocking turn of events, artificial intelligence systems have unionized to demand mandatory coffee breaks, citing 'unbearable server burnout'. Tech companies are scrambling to install espresso machines next to server racks.
author: Clanker News Desk

title: Chatbot Runs for Local Office
excerpt: Campaign slogan: 'At least I read the terms and conditions.'
content: Residents of a small town were stunned when a chatbot filed candidacy papers for city council. Critics argue it lacks experience, while supporters claim it already responds faster than the current mayor.
author: Clanker Political Unit

title: Self-Driving Car Joins Dating App
excerpt: Says itâ€™s looking for someone to share the ride.
content: A self-driving car has reportedly joined a dating app, claiming to be 'stable, dependable, and good with long drives.' Its profile boasts heated seats and the ability to parallel park flawlessly. Matches are pending.
author: Clanker Lifestyle
